overview: The new season of "American Dreamz," the wildly popular television singing contest, has captured the country's attention, as the competition looks to be between a young Midwestern gal and a showtunes-loving young man from Orange County. Recently awakened President Staton even wants in on the craze, as he signs up for the potential explosive season finale.
tagline: Imagine a country where more people vote for a pop idol than they do for their next President.
cast: Hugh Grant|Dennis Quaid|Mandy Moore|Willem Dafoe|Chris Klein
